    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(Event event)
        Description copied from interface: Observer
        This method is called whenever the observed object is changed. An application calls an Observable#notifyObservers() method to have all the object's observers notified of the change.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer
        Parameters:
        event - an event passed to theObservable#notifyObservers() method.
